comment: TAKE THIS PROFESSOR IF YOU CAN. he honestly just wants you to do well. he wants you to succeed. everything's done through math lab except for tests. your homework is opened till the end of the semester, two tries on quizzes, and he gives you review problems before the test. he drops the lowest test grade too. TAKE HIM!! he's amazing and super nice!

The entire class is done through MyMathLab. Homework is an easy 100 because you can redo it until you get it right. You are allowed up to two attempts per quiz. He drops the lowest test and quiz grade at the end of the semester. I taught myself what needed to be taught and currently have an A+ in his class. Take his class if you can!!

Professor Waldring is the BEST. I was a little worried about taking college algebra because math isn't usually my strong point, but I haven't made below a 100 on any homework, quiz, or test yet! He gives you two attempts per each quiz, and drops the lowest quiz and test grade. TAKE HIM TAKE HIM TAKE HIM!!!

Professor Walding is the best math teacher you can take. He explains everything until everyone understands the material and is happy to answer all questions. He does get a little mixed doing problems on the board, which can be a little confusing at times. However, all quizzes and homework is done online and 4 test total. TAKE HIM!

I have little attention span so sitting through his classes were next to impossible for me. He is very willing to help if you have problems! Most of this class is high school algebra and he oversimplifies the problems to the point where I'm not even sure if I'm doing math or not. He's a nice guy though and it's virtually impossible to not pass.

Mr. Waldring is very kind! Currently in his MATH 1111 class and it's the easiest thing ever; basically covering what you learn in HS algebra. He definitely oversimplifies things, super helpful for those who aren't strong in math.  4 tests, and online quizzes (2 attempts). You won't regret taking him. Only need the MyMathLab code.

Great guy! Reviews are exactly like exams, but with diff numbers. Hw on mymath lab is due end of semester. 4 exams total. Drops lowest quiz grade on Mymath lab. Final had a 20% curve. Very helpful! TAKE HIM!!!! This is from a person who's never gotten over a C in any math class, and I got an A+.
Loved professor Waldring. Calculus is hard but he made it so much easier. Definitely take him if you can.

Probably the easiest professor you will ever have. He's super nice and teaches clearly! Class not mandatory, I went to probably half of the classes and made an A on every test (lowest is dropped). Very understanding and willing to help if you ask for it! Take him, you won't regret it! Even though it's an 8pm class, it's worth it for the professor!

I took his 8 week summer semester and while it was quick it was really easy. If you have questions he takes the time to answer them. His tests are all multiple choice but you will need to know formulas. Quizzes are due the class before a test but he didn't go over them at all, ask him to and your entire class will do better.

I thought he was great. He takes time to make sure you understand the problem. Gives extra credit and goes over the tests thoroughly. Drops lowest test and lowest quiz grade. Don't buy the book, just need the math lab access. Doesn't take roll, but if you attend the classes you'll do well on tests.

Easiest math class! Attend class and take notes and you will definitely get an A. He's a super nice guy and willing to work out any math problems you struggle with. Don't buy the book, he uses my math lab. 4 tests, lowest one dropped. There was like 6 quizzes- all online and you get 2 attempts, lowest quiz dropped. Take him, you wont regret it!

doesn't care about attendance. don't even buy the book. drops the lowest test and quiz. Super nice guy! For tests and quizzes just do the homework and youll get an A. Everything is easy on mymathlab so i never went to class except for test. Super chill easy class

This guy knows his stuff, however, he struggles to explain it sometimes. He is very nice and helpful but not a natural teacher. If your good at math he is an easy A. If not get a little help from one of you class mates. The math is easy enough where I taught myself instead of paying attention. Can't say he is amazing but he isn't bad either.

Very chill, easy to understand, gets that most students aren't math majors. attendance not required but it helps a lot. drops lowest test & quiz, quizzes mostly online, lets u bring a cheat sheet to tests after 1st one. online textbook code thing required but u don't need an actual book. usually teaches 2 sections so u can flex ur time

Sergio is an incredibly nice guy.  Doesn't appear to really prepare for class.  Lots of "redos" which make it confusing.  Thank God for MyMathLab!!! It's very clear w/lots of examples.  He gives a really clear study guide (online). Staying for his lectures though only confused.  I ended up just doing MyMathLab and made an A.  I do like math though.

Good teacher. I love math and this was a very easy class. You don't use the textbook, he puts it online. Also puts videos up to help if you need it. Has about four tests but if you understand what's going on then you'll be fine.
Excellent professor! He teaches in a way that anyone can understand. Seems to have a dry personality, but he's awesome.

I am HORRIBLE at math, but he sets you up to succeed in his class. As long as you attend all his classes you WILL UNDERSTAND the material. He's extremely helpful and is in general just a great teacher. Best math teacher I've ever had!!!
He is wonderful; kind, helpful and humble.
Ok here is the bottom line, if you are looking to pass Trig. take him period. If you fail his class then you should not be taking college math!!! There I have dumbed it down the best I can for yu.

He's pretty cool. Hawaiian accent i think, so 15 and 50 are both 'fitty', and "Third" and "30" are "turd(y)" but its just funny =] My grade is not good but it's because I literally do not understand math. Tells you what's on the tests and helps whenever necessary. only complaint is that it's math. blegh

Really great teacher; basically tells you the questions that will be on each test, and allows single sided 8x10 cheat sheets for each exam. Treats all of his students as equals and not children & takes class input regarding test schedules.

I absolutely love this professor. I'm very confused by the other comments because I completely disagree!He is more than helpful. I am terrible at math but I have gotten an A on the first two tests. I highly suggest this professor.
If you are not good in math this is not the teacher for you. He will not help you pass his class. He has little or no concern about the grade he gives you.  Need help or not good in math stay away.
Not a good teacher at all, wish I had taken somebody else.

is a nice guy but a horrible teacher. He goes completly by the book. better to just teach ur self with book. He has only been teaching a few years and doesn't seem that he has the flow yet. he curves and drops lowest test grade.shows too many ways to solve problems which is confusing. had straight A's in math before his class.use math lab if u take
He helPs

BEST TEACHER EVER ! HATED MATH BUT LOVED IT THIS YEAR ! EXPLAIN THINGS TO THE "T" ! DROP LOW GRADES AND 5 POINTS ADDED TO FINAL GRADE IF YOU GO TO CLASS EVERYDAY ! TAKE HIM I LOVED HIM ! wished he taught stat !
I love this teacher! You won't regret taking him. He's funny and makes the class fun and interesting. His tests are easy, he's very helpful and has the qualities of a great professor!!
Makes learning fun and exciting!  Teaching style is adaptable to the ability of utilizing these mathematical concepts in every day life!

Prof Waldring is a great!! he doesn't give loads of HW and drops the lowest grade. 3 tests, quiz every 2 chapters, tests are just like the quiz :) He gives 10 points for every HW to turn in, and extra credit question(5 points) every test. Easy A! Totally recommend him! and he's pretty cool :)
Students who take this course will definetly benefit from this professor's technique.  If you didn't feel to confident in math before, you will after completing this class.
You will definetly benefit from this class with the techniques that this professor uses.  If you didn't like math before, you will after completing this course.

Class was very laid back and easy to learn if you pay attention. Attendance is not mandatory but you get extra credit for showing up. Tests and quizzes are from the notes and some homework is graded. Really enjoyed learning from Professor Waldring.
